oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Hill Redevelopment Area, 1953
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Charlotte Avenue, in the Capitol Hill redevelopment area (Point No. 7), 18 November 1953. Thoni's gas station is visible in the foreground. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
